Event.name: Exercising
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> actively maintains or improves their level of phyiscal fitness. The action may target a specific <fen>Body_part</fen>, or happen through a particular <fen>Means</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Football players</fex> <t>exercise</t> <fex name="Frequency">every day</fex>.</ex> <ex>Don't <t>work out</t> <fex name="Body_part">your legs</fex> <fex name="Time">after a long run</fex>. <fex name="Agent">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is trying to improve or maintain their physical fitness.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The manager</fex> <t>exercises</t> before and after work.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Body_part
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An area of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s body that the activity is direct at.
<ex>Is there a way to <t>exercise</t> <fex name="Body_part">the neck muscles</fex>?</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Something that the <fen>Agent</fen> uses to exercise.
<ex>He <t>trains</t> <fex name="Means">with weight machines</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A general description of how the <fen>Agent</fen> acts while exercising.
<ex>With only 2 weeks until the race, Joan was <t>exercising</t> <fex name="Manner">frantically</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time that the <fen>Agent</fen> exercises.
<ex>I like to <t>exercise</t> <fex name="Time">at 3 am</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location of the Agent while exercising.
<ex>Some people only <t>exercise</t> <fex name="Place">in gyms</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>How often the <fen>Agent</fen> works on their fitness.
<ex>He <fex name="Frequency">rarely</fex> <t>works out</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Subtype
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element describes a subtype of the more general exercise category. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> exercises.
<ex>The doctor told me I have to <t>exercise</t> <fex name="Purpose">to lose weight</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: exercise.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to engage in activities which maintain or improve the state of one's body

lexUnit.name: work out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: improve physical strength through directed activity

lexUnit.name: exercise.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an activity requiring physical effort carried out for the sake of health and fitness.
